src: “Kami kini mempunyai seekor anak tikus yang berusia 4 bulan yang sudah tidak menghidap diabetes,” beliau menambah.
mt: “We now have a four-month-old mouse that is no longer diabetic,” he added.
ref: "We now have 4-month-old mice that are non-diabetic that used to be diabetic," he added.

src: Dr. Ehud Ur, profesor perubatan di University Dalhousie dalam Halifax, Nova Scotia dan ketua bahagian klinikal dan saintifik Persatuan Diabetes Kanada mengingatkan bahawa penyelidikan masih dalam peringkat awal.
mt: Dr. Ehud Ur, a medical professor at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and head of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association reminds that research is still in its early stages.
ref: Dr. Ehud Ur, professor of medicine at Dalhousie University in Halifax, Nova Scotia and chair of the clinical and scientific division of the Canadian Diabetes Association cautioned that the research is still in its early days.

src: Seperti beberapa pakar lain, beliau skeptikal sama ada diabetes boleh disembuhkan, dan menyatakan bahawa penemuan-penemuan ini tidak relevan kepada mereka yang telah menghidapi diabetes Jenis 1.
mt: Like some other experts, he is skeptical whether diabetes can be cured, and states that these findings are irrelevant to those who have had Type 1 diabetes.
ref: Like some other experts, he is skeptical about whether diabetes can be cured, noting that these findings have no relevance to people who already have Type 1 diabetes.

src: Pada hari Isnin, Sara Danius, setiausaha tetap kepada Jawatankuiasa Nobel untuk Sastera di Akademi Sweden, mengumumkan secara terbuka semasa rancangan radio di radio Sveriges di Sweden jawatankuasa, tidak dapat mengubungi Bob Dylan secara langsung berkaitan kemenangan Hadiah Nobel Sastera 2016, telah meninggalkan usaha untuk menhgubunginya.
mt: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary to the Swedish Academy, announced publicly during a radio program on Swedish radio that the committee, unable to directly contact Bob Dylan regarding his 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had given up trying to reach him.
ref: On Monday, Sara Danius, permanent secretary of the Nobel Committee for Literature at the Swedish Academy, publicly announced during a radio program on Sveriges Radio in Sweden the committee, unable to reach Bob Dylan directly about winning the 2016 Nobel Prize in Literature, had abandoned its efforts to reach him.

src: Danius berkata, “Sekarang kita sedang tidak membuat apa-apa. Saya telah memanggil dan menghantar e-mel kepada rakan-rakannya yang terdekat dan telah menerima maklum balas yang mesra. Untuk waktu ini, itu tentunya mencukupi.”
mt: Danius said, "Now we are not doing anything. I have called and emailed my closest colleagues and have received friendly responses. For now, that is enough."
ref: Danius said, "Right now we are doing nothing. I have called and sent emails to his closest collaborator and received very friendly replies. For now, that is certainly enough."

src: Sebelum ini, CEO Ring, Jamie Siminoff, mengatakan syarikat itu bermula apabila loceng pintu beliau tidak dapat didengar dari kedai dalam garajnya.
mt: Previously, CEO Ring, Jamie Siminoff, said the company began when his doorbell couldn't be heard from his store in his garage.
ref: Previously, Ring's CEO, Jamie Siminoff, remarked the company started when his doorbell wasn't audible from his shop in his garage.

src: Dia menghasilkan loceng pintu WiFi, katanya.
mt: He produced a WiFi doorbell, he said.
ref: He built a WiFi door bell, he said.

src: Siminoff mengatakan bahawa jualan telah meningkat setelah penampilan beliau pada tahun 2013 dalam sebuah episod Shark Tank di mana panel rancangan tersebut menolak untuk membiayai permulaannya.
mt: Siminoff said sales have increased after his appearance on a 2013 episode of Shark Tank where the show's panel rejected funding his start-up.
ref: Siminoff said sales boosted after his 2013 appearance in a Shark Tank episode where the show panel declined funding the startup.

src: Pada akhir 2017, Siminoff muncul pada saluran televisyen membeli-belah QVC.
mt: 2017, Siminoff appeared on the shopping channel QVC.
ref: In late 2017, Siminoff appeared on shopping television channel QVC.

src: Ring turut mencapai satu penyelesaian tuntutan mahkamah dengan syarikat keselamatan pesaing, ADT Corporation.
mt: The ring also reached a settlement with a competing security company, ADT Corporation.
ref: Ring also settled a lawsuit with competing security company, the ADT Corporation.

src: Walaupun satu vaksin eksperimen menunjukkan keupayaan mengurangkan kadar kematian Ebola, namun sehingga kini, tiada ubat yang jelas terbukti sesuai untuk merawat jangkitan sedia ada.
mt: Although one experimental vaccine shows ability to reduce death rates from Ebola, there is still no clear treatment for existing infections.
ref: While one experimental vaccine appears able to reduce Ebola mortality, up until now, no drugs have been clearly demonstrated suitable for treating existing infection.

src: Satu campuran antibodi iaitu ZMapp, pada awalnya menunjukkan peluang kejayaan tinggi dalam bidang itu, namun kajian formal menunjukkan bahawa ia kurang bermanfaat daripada yang dijangka dalam mencegah kematian.
mt: A monoclonal antibody combination called ZMapp, initially showed high success rates in the field, but formal studies showed it was less effective than expected in preventing death.
ref: One antibody cocktail, ZMapp, initially showed promise in the field, but formal studies indicated it had less benefit than sought in preventing death.

src: Semasa percubaan PALM, ZMapp berfungsi sebagai rawatan kawalan yang bermaksud ahli sains menggunakannya sebagai garis dasar dan membandingkan tiga rawatan lain dengannya.
mt: During the PALM trial, ZMapp was used as a control treatment, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared three other treatments with it.
ref: In the PALM trial, ZMapp served as a control, meaning scientists used it as a baseline and compared the three other treatments to it.

src: Amerika Syarikat Gimnastik menyokong surat Komuniti Olimpik Amerika Syarikat dan menerima keperluan mutlak keluarga Olimpik bagi mewujudkan persekitaran yang selamat untuk semua atlet kita.
mt: The United States Gymnastics supports the letter of the United States Olympic Committee and recognizes the absolute necessity of the Olympic family to create a safe environment for all of our athletes.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports the United States Olympic Committee's letter and accepts the absolute need of the Olympic family to promote a safe environment for all of our athletes.

src: Kami bersetuju dengan kenyataan USOC bahawa kami boleh menjaga kepentingan atlet dan kelab kami, dan sukan mereka, dengan lebih baik di masa hadapan dengan perubahan yang lebih bermakna di dalam organisasi kami, dan bukannya pembatalan kesahan.
mt: We agree with the USOC's statement that we can better protect the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sports, in the future with more meaningful changes within our organization, rather than a decertification.
ref: We agree with the USOC's statement that the interests of our athletes and clubs, and their sport, may be better served by moving forward with meaningful change within our organization, rather than decertification.

src: Gimnastik Amerika Syarikat menyokong siasatan bebas yang mungkin boleh mendedahkan kesah deraan Larry Nassar dan mengambil tindakan perubahan yang wajar berkaitan kesah deraan yang dibongkarkan dengan berani oleh mangsa-mangsa beliau di mana perbuatan keji ini berlaku tanpa dikesan untuk tempoh masa yang lama.
mt: The United States Gymnastics team supports an independent investigation that may reveal the abuse of Larry Nassar and take appropriate action regarding the abuse that was revealed by his victims in a bold manner where these heinous acts occurred without being detected for a long time.
ref: USA Gymnastics supports an independent investigation that may shine light on how abuse of the proportion described so courageously by the survivors of Larry Nassar could have gone undetected for so long and embraces any necessary and appropriate changes.

src: Gimnastik AS dan JOAS mempunyai matlamat yang sama, menjadikan sukan gimnastik dan lain-lain selamat bagi para atlet untuk mengejar impian mereka dalam persekitaran yang selamat, positif dan berdaya maju.
mt: The USA and JOA have the same goal, making gymnastics and other sports safe for athletes to pursue their dreams in a safe, positive and progressive environment.
ref: USA Gymnastics and the USOC have the same goal — making the sport of gymnastics, and others, as safe as possible for athletes to follow their dreams in a safe, positive and empowered environment.

src: Sepanjang tahun 1960-an, Brzezinski telah bekerja untuk John F Kennedy sebagai penasihat dan kemudian sewaktu pentadbiran Lyndon B Johnson.
mt: During the 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F Kennedy as an advisor and later during the Lyndon B Johnson administration.
ref: Throughout 1960s, Brzezinski worked for John F. Kennedy as his advisor and then the Lyndon B. Johnson administration.

src: Pada pemilihan 1976 beliau menasihatkan Carter berkenaan polisi asing, lepas itu berkhidmat sebagai Penasihat Keselamatan Nasional (NSA) dari 1977 sehingga 1981 menggantikan Henry Kissinger.
mt: 1976 he advised Carter on foreign policy, later serving as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, replacing Henry Kissinger.
ref: During the 1976 selections he advised Carter on foreign policy, then served as National Security Advisor (NSA) from 1977 to 1981, succeeding Henry Kissinger.

src: Sebagai anggota NSA, beliau telah membantu Carter mengurus urusan sedunia dengan diplomatik, seperti Perjanjian Camp David, 1978, membiasakan hubungan AS-Cina sepanjang tahun 1970-an, Revolusi Iran yang menyebabkan krisis tawanan Iran, 1979, dan Penyerangan Soviet di Afghanistan, 1979.
mt: As a member of the NSA, he helped Carter manage world affairs diplomatically, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978, normalizing US-China relations throughout the 1970s, the Iranian Revolution that led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979, and the Soviet invasion of Afghanistan, 1979.
ref: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.

src: Filem, dibintangi Ryan Gosling dan Emma Stone, menerima pencalonan dalam semua kategori utama.
mt: The film, starring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.
ref: The movie, featuring Ryan Gosling and Emma Stone, received nominations in all major categories.

src: Gosling dan Stone masing-masing dicalonkan untuk Pelakon Lelaki dan Wanita Terbaik.
mt: Gosling and Stone were each nominated for Best Actor and Actress.
ref: Gosling and Stone received nominations for Best Actor and Actress respectively.

src: Pencalonan yang lain termasuk Filem, Pengarah, Sinematografi, Rekaan Kostum, Penyuntingan Filem, Skor Asal, Reka Bentuk Produksi, Penyuntingan Bunyi, Pencampuran Bunyi dan Lakon Layar Asal Terbaik.
mt: Other nominations include Film, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film Editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Best Original Screenplay.
ref: The other nominations include Best Picture, Director, Cinematography, Costume Design, Film-editing, Original Score, Production Design, Sound Editing, Sound Mixing and Original Screenplay.

src: Dua lagu dari filem tersebut, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) dan City of Stars, menerima pencalonan untuk muzik asal terbaik. Studio Lionsgate menerima 26 pencalonan — lebih banyak berbanding mana-mana studio lain.
mt: Two songs from the film, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Studio Lionsgate received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.
ref: Two songs from the movie, Audition (The Fools Who Dream) and City of Stars, received nominations for best original song. Lionsgate studio received 26 nominations — more than any other studio.

src: Lewat pada hari Ahad, Presiden Amerika Syarikat Donald Trump, dalam satu kenyataan dihantar melalui setiausaha akhbar, mengumumkan tentera AS akan meninggalkan Syria.
mt: On Sunday, U.S. President Donald Trump, in a statement sent through his press secretary, announced that U.S. troops will leave Syria.
ref: Late on Sunday, the United States President Donald Trump, in a statement delivered via the press secretary, announced US troops would be leaving Syria.

src: Pengumuman tersebut dibuat selepas Trump mengadakan perbualan telefon dengan Presiden Turki Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
mt: The announcement came after Trump spoke by phone with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.
ref: The announcement was made after Trump had a phone conversation with Turkish President Recep Tayyip Erdoğan.

src: Turki akan juga mengambil alih kawalan ke atas tawanan pejuang ISIS yang, kata kenyataan itu, negara-negara Eropah tidak bersetuju untuk dikembalikan.
mt: Turkey will also take control of the ISIS fighters, who, according to the statement, European countries disagree to return.
ref: Turkey would also take over guarding captured ISIS fighters which, the statement said, European nations have refused to repatriate.

src: Hal ini bukan sahaja mengesahkan bahawa dinosaur tertentu mempunyai bulu, satu teori yang sudah tersebar luas, tetapi menyediakan butir-butir khusus yang secara amnya tidak dapat diberi oleh fosil, misalnya warna dan penyusunan tiga dimensi.
mt: This not only confirms that certain dinosaurs had feathers, a theory that has been widely spread, but provides details that are generally not possible to give by fossils, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.
ref: This not only confirms that at least some dinosaurs had feathers, a theory already widespread, but provides details fossils generally cannot, such as color and three-dimensional arrangement.

src: . Para saintis mengatakan bahawa bulu haiwan ini berwarna coklat perang di bahagian atas dengan bahagian bawah adalah pucat atau berwarna karotenoid.
mt: . Scientists say the animal's fur is reddish-brown on top with the underside being pale or carotenoid-colored.
ref: . Scientists say this animal's plumage was chestnut-brown on top with a pale or carotenoid-colored underside.

src: Kajian juga memberi wawasan tentang evolusi bulu pelepah pada burung.
mt: The study also sheds light on the evolution of feathers on birds.
ref: The find also grants insight into the evolution of feathers in birds.

src: Oleh sebab bulu dinosaur tidak mempunyai batang yang tumbuh dengan baik, yang dipanggil rakis, tetapi mempunyai ciri-ciri bulu lain - duri dan barbul - penyelidik menyimpulkan bahawa rakis berkemungkinan satu perkembangan evolusi ciri-ciri lain ini yang datang kemudian.
mt: Because dinosaur hair did not have a well-developed shaft, which is called the rachis, but had other hair characteristics - spines and barbs - researchers concluded that the rachis may be a later evolutionary development of these other characteristics.
ref: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.

src: Struktur bulu mencadangkan bahawa ia tidak digunakan untuk tujuan terbang tetapi lebih kepada pengawalan suhu atau untuk dipamerkan. Para penyelidik mencadangkan, walaupun ekor itu ekor dinosaur berusia muda, sample menunjukkan bulu adalah milik dewasa dan bukan yang muda.
mt: The structure of the feathers suggests that it was not used for flight but rather for temperature control or display. Researchers suggest, although the tail is that of a young dinosaur, the sample shows the feathers are those of an adult and not a juvenile.
ref: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Para penyelidik mencadangkan, walaupun itu ekor dinosaur yang muda, sampel berkenaan menunjukkan bulu dewasa dan bukan bulu halus anak ayam.
mt: Researchers suggest, although it is a young dinosaur tail, the sample shows adult feathers and not downy feathers of a chick.
ref: The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

src: Sebuah bom kereta meletup di ibu pejabat polis di Gaziantep, Turki pagi semalam yang membunuh dua pegawai polis dan mencederakan lebih dari dua puluh mangsa yang lain.
mt: A car bomb exploded outside a police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning, killing two police officers and injuring more than twenty other victims.
ref: A car bomb detonated at police headquarters in Gaziantep, Turkey yesterday morning killed two police officers and injured more than twenty other people.

src: Pejabat gabenor berkata sembilan belas daripada yang tercedera adalah pegawai polis.
mt: The governor's office said 19 of the injured were police officers.
ref: The governor's office said nineteen of the injured were police officers.

src: Polis menyatakan bahawa mereka mengesyaki seorang yang disangka militan Daesh (ISIL) bertanggungjawab untuk serangan tersebut.
mt: Police say they suspect a suspected Daesh (ISIL) militant is responsible for the attack.
ref: Police said they suspect an alleged Daesh (ISIL) militant of responsibility for the attack.

src: Mereka mendapati bahawa Matahari beroperasi menggunakan prinsip dasar yang sama dengan bintang lain. Aktiviti semua bintang di sistem didapati terpengaruh dengan kilauan, putaran dan tiada yang lain.
mt: They found that the Sun operates on the same basic principles as other stars. The activity of all stars in the system is found to be affected by the glare, rotation and nothing else.
ref: They found the Sun operated on the same basic principles as other stars: The activity of all stars in the system was found to be driven by their luminosity, their rotation, and nothing else.

src: Kilauan dan putaran digunakan bersama untuk menentukan nombor Rossby sebuah bintang, yang berkaitan dengan aliran plasma.
mt: Rotation and spin are used together to determine the Rossby number of a star, which is related to plasma flow.
ref: The luminosity and rotation are used together to determine a star's Rossby number, which is related to plasma flow.

src: Semakin kecil nombor Rossby, semakin kurang aktif bintang dari segi pembalikan magnetik.
mt: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star is in terms of magnetic reversal.
ref: The smaller the Rossby number, the less active the star with respect to magnetic reversals.

src: Sewaktu perjalanannya, Iwasaki menghadapi beberapa masalah.
mt: During his journey, Iwasaki faced several problems.
ref: During his trip, Iwasaki ran into trouble on many occasions.

src: Dia telah dirompak oleh lanun, diserang di Tibet oleh anjing gila, melarikan diri daripada perkahwinan di Nepal dan telah ditangkap di India.
mt: He was robbed by pirates, attacked by mad dogs in Tibet, ran away from a wedding in Nepal and was arrested in India.
ref: He was robbed by pirates, attacked in Tibet by a rabid dog, escaped marriage in Nepal and was arrested in India.

src: Standard 802.11n beroperasi pada kedua-dua frekuensi 2.4Ghz dan 5.0Ghz.
mt: 802.11n operates on both 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.
ref: The 802.11n standard operates on both the 2.4Ghz and 5.0Ghz frequencies.

src: Ini akan membolehkannya menjadi serasi secara terbalik dengan 802.11a, 802.11b dan 802.11g, dengan syarat bahawa stesen asas mempunyai dwi radio.
mt: This will allow it to be backward compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided the base station has dual radios.
ref: This will allow it to be backwards compatible with 802.11a, 802.11b and 802.11g, provided that the base station has dual radios.

src: Kelajuan 802.11n jauh lebih cepat daripada model sebelum ini dengan daya pemprosesan teori maksimum 600Mbit/s.
mt: 802.11n speeds are much faster than previous models with a theoretical maximum processing power of 600Mbit/s.
ref: The speeds of 802.11n are substantially faster than that of its predecessors with a maximum theoretical throughput of 600Mbit/s.

src: Duvall, yang telah berkahwin dan mempunyai dua orang anak dewasa, tidak meninggal kesan yang besar pada Miller, yang maklumkan cerita berkenaan.
mt: Duvall, who is married and has two adult children, did not leave a large estate to Miller, who announced the story.
ref: Duvall, who is married with two adult children, did not leave a big impression on Miller, to whom the story was related.

src: Apabila diminta untuk memberi komen, Miller berkata, “Mike banyak bercakap semasa pendengaran itu...Saya sedang bersiap sedia oleh itu saya tidak dengar apa yang beliau cakap.”
mt: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talked a lot during the hearing...I was ready so I didn't hear what he said."
ref: When asked for comment, Miller said, "Mike talks a lot during the hearing...I was getting ready so I wasn't really hearing what he was saying."

src: “Kami akan berusaha mengurangkan pengeluaran karbon dioksida per unit dari KDNK dengan margin yang ketara menjelang 2020 dari peringkat 2005,” kata Hu.
mt: “We will try to reduce carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a significant margin by 2020 from the 2005 level,” Hu said.
ref: "We will endeavour to cut carbon dioxide emissions per unit of GDP by a notable margin by 2020 from the 2005 level," Hu said.

src: Beliau tidak menetapkan nilai untuk potongan tersebut, sambil menyatakan bahawa ia akan dibuat berdasarkan pengeluaran ekonomi Cina.
mt: He did not set a value for the cut, while stating that it will be made based on China's economic output.
ref: He did not set a figure for the cuts, saying they will be made based on China's economic output.

src: Hu menggalakkan negara-negara membangun “untuk mengelakkan jalan lama tercemar yang pertama dan membersihkan kemudian.”
mt: Hu encourages developing countries “to avoid the old polluted roads first and clean up later.”
ref: Hu encouraged developing countries "to avoid the old path of polluting first and cleaning up later."

src: Dia menambah bahawa “mereka tidak harus sebaliknya diminta untuk memikul tanggungjawab yang melampaui tahap perkembangan, tanggungjawab dan kemampuan mereka.”
mt: He added that "they should not be asked to bear responsibilities that exceed their level of development, responsibilities and capabilities."
ref: He added that "they should not, however, be asked to take on obligations that go beyond their development stage, responsibility and capabilities."

src: Kumpulan Kajian Iraq telah membentangkan laporan mereka pada pukul 12.00 GMT hari ini.
mt: The Iraq Study Group has presented their report at 12:00 GMT today.
ref: The Iraq Study Group presented its report at 12.00 GMT today.

src: Ia memberi amaran bahawa Tiada siapa dapat menjamin apa-apa tindakan di Iraq pada ketika ini yang akan menghentikan peperangan pengikut, keganasan yang semakin meningkat atau ke arah kekacauan.
mt: It warned that no one can guarantee any action in Iraq at this time will stop the sectarian violence, increasing violence or towards chaos.
ref: It warns No one can guarantee that any course of action in Iraq at this point will stop sectarian warfare, growing violence, or a slide toward chaos.

src: Laporan berkenaan dibuka dengan permohonan untuk perdebatan terbuka dan pembentukan persepakatan di Amerika Syarikat berkenaan dasar menuju Timur Tengah.
mt: The report opens with a request for an open debate and the formation of an agreement in the United States regarding policy towards the Middle East.
ref: The Report opens with plea for open debate and the formation of a consensus in the United States about the policy towards the Middle East.

src: Laporan itu sangat kritikal terhadap hampir semua aspek polisi Eksekutif sedia ada terhadap Iraq dan ia mendesak perubahan hala tuju dengan serta-merta.
mt: The report is highly critical of nearly all aspects of the Executive's current policy towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of course.
ref: The Report is highly critical of almost every aspect of the present policy of the Executive towards Iraq and it urges an immediate change of direction.

src: Pertama antara 78 cadangannya adalah inisiatif diplomatik baharu yang perlu diambil sebelum akhir tahun ini untuk mendapatkan sempadan Iraq terhadap campur tangan musuh dan untuk mewujudkan semula hubungan diplomatik dengan negara jiran.
mt: 1 of 78 recommendations is a new diplomatic initiative that must be taken before the end of this year to get Iraq's border against enemy interference and to create a new diplomatic relationship with neighboring countries.
ref: First among its 78 recommendations is that a new diplomatic initiative should be taken before the end of this year to secure Iraq’s borders against hostile interventions and to re-establish diplomatic relations with its neighbors.

src: Senator semasa dan Wanita Pertama Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner mengumumkan pencalonannya sebagai presiden petang semalam di La Plata, sebuah kota 50 kilometer (31 batu) dari Buenos Aires.
mt: Current and First Lady of Argentina Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her candidacy for president last night in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) from Buenos Aires.
ref: Current senator and Argentine First Lady Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner announced her presidential candidacy yesterday evening in La Plata, a city 50 kilometers (31 miles) away from Buenos Aires.

src: Puan Kirchner mengumumkan hasrat beliau untuk mencalonkan dirinya sebagai presiden di Argentine Theatre, lokasi sama yang beliau menggunakan dulu untuk memulakan kempen untuk Senat pada 2005 sebagai anggota delegasi wilayah Buenos Aires.
mt: Mrs Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to begin her campaign for the Senate in 2005 as a member of the Buenos Aires delegation.
ref: Mrs. Kirchner announced her intention to run for president at the Argentine Theatre, the same location she used to start her 2005 campaign for the Senate as member of the Buenos Aires province delegation.

src: Debat telah dicetuskan oleh kontroversi mengenai perbelanjaan untuk bantuan dan pembinaan semula akibat Taufan Katrina; yang dilabel oleh konservatif kewangan secara seloroh sebagai “Bush's New Orleans Deal.”
mt: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending for aid and rebuilding from Hurricane Katrina; which was derided by fiscal conservatives as "Bush's New Orleans Deal."
ref: The debate was sparked by controversy over spending on relief and reconstruction in the wake Hurricane Katrina; which some fiscal conservatives have humorously labeled "Bush's New Orleans Deal."

src: Kritikan bebas terhadap usaha pembinaan semula telah difokuskan kepada pemberian kontrak pembinaan semula untuk melihat orang dalam Washington.
mt: Free criticism of the rebuilding effort has focused on the awarding of rebuilding contracts to see who in Washington.
ref: Liberal criticism of the reconstruction effort has focused on the awarding of reconstruction contracts to perceived Washington insiders.

src: Lebih daripada empat juta orang telah pergi ke Rom untuk menghadiri pengebumiannya.
mt: 4 million people have gone to Rome to attend his funeral.
ref: Over four million people went to Rome to attend the funeral.

src: Kehadiran orang adalah sangat ramai tidak mungkin setiap dapat masuk ke pengebumian dalam St. Peter’s Square.
mt: The presence of people is so great that it is not possible for everyone to enter the funeral in St. Peter's Square.
ref: The number of people present was so large that it was not possible for everybody to gain access to the funeral in St. Peter's Square.

src: Beberapa skrin televisyen besar dipasang di pelbagai tempat di Rom untuk memberikan orang menonton upacara tersebut.
mt: Several large TV screens were set up in various places in Rome to allow people to watch the ceremony.
ref: Several large television screens were installed in various places in Rome to let the people watch the ceremony.

src: Di banyak bandar lain di Itali dan di seluruh dunia, terutamanya di Poland, persediaan yang serupa dibuat, yang dilihat oleh sebilangan besar orang.
mt: In many other Italian cities and around the world, especially in Poland, similar preparations were made, seen by a large number of people.
ref: In many other cities of Italy and in the rest of the world, particularly in Poland, similar setups were made, which were viewed by a great number of people.

src: Ahli sejarah telah mengkritik polisi FBI dahulu kerana menumpukan sumber kepada kes-kes yang mudah diselesaikan, terutamanya kes-kes kecurian kereta, dengan tujuan untuk meningkatkan kadar kejayaan agensi berkenaan.
mt: Historians have criticized the FBI's former policy of focusing resources on easy-to-solve cases, particularly car thefts, with the goal of increasing the agency's success rate.
ref: Historians have criticized past FBI policies for focusing resources on cases which are easy to solve, especially stolen car cases, with the intent of boosting the agency's success rate.

src: Kongres mula membiayai inisiatif bahan lucah dalam tahun fiskal 2005 dan menyatakan bahawa FBI mesti menugaskan 10 ejen terhadap pornografi dewasa.
mt: Congress began funding the pornography initiative in the fiscal year 2005 and stated that the FBI must assign 10 agents to adult pornography.
ref: Congress began funding the obscenity initiative in fiscal 2005 and specified that the FBI must devote 10 agents to adult pornography.

src: Robin Uthappa mendapat skor innings tertinggi, 70 larian dengan hanya 41 bola dengan memukul 11 empat dan 2 enam.
mt: Robin Uthappa scored the highest innings score, 70 runs with just 41 balls with 11 fours and 2 sixes.
ref: Robin Uthappa made the innings highest score, 70 runs in just 41 balls by hitting 11 fours and 2 sixes.

src: Pemukul pertengahan, Sachin Tendulkar dan Rahul Dravid, menunjukkan prestasi yang baik dan bekerjasama untuk menghasilkan skor seratus larian
mt: Middle-order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, showed good form and combined to score a century stand
ref: Middle order batsmen, Sachin Tendulkar and Rahul Dravid, performed well and made a hundred-run partnership.

src: Tetapi, setelah kalah wiket kapten, India hanya membuat 36 larian, dan kalah 7 wiket untuk mengakhiri inning.
mt: But after losing captain, India only made 36 runs, and lost 7 wickets to end the innings.
ref: But, after losing the captain's wicket India only made 36 runs loosing 7 wickets to end the innings.

src: Presiden AS George W Bush telah tiba di Singapura pada pagi 16 November, menandakan permulaan lawatan yang berlangsung seminggu di Asia.
mt: 16 November 2006: US President George W Bush arrived in Singapore this morning, marking the start of a week-long tour of Asia.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush arrived in Singapore the morning of November 16, beginning a week-long tour of Asia.

src: Beliau disambut oleh Timbalan Perdana Menteri Singapura Wong Kan Seng dan membincangkan isu perdagangan dan keganasan dengan Lee Hsien Loong, Perdana Menteri Singapura.
mt: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with Lee Hsien Loong, Prime Minister of Singapore.
ref: He was greeted by Singapore's Deputy Prime Minister Wong Kan Seng and discussed trade and terrorism issues with the Singapore Prime Minister Lee Hsien Loong.

src: Selepas kerugian beberapa minggu di pilihanraya separuh penggal,Bush memberitahu para hadirin berkenaan pengembangan perdagangan di Asia.
mt: After weeks of losses in the mid-term elections, Bush told the audience about the development of trade in Asia.
ref: After a week of losses in the midterm election, Bush told an audience about the expansion of trade in Asia.

src: Perdana Menteri Stephen Harper telah bersetuju untuk mengemukakan “Akta Udara Bersih” kerajaan kepada jawatankuasa semua parti untuk dikaji semula, sebelum pembacaan keduanya, selepas mesyuarat 25 minit hari Selasa bersama ketua NDP Jack Layton di PMO.
mt: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to submit the government's "Clean Air Act" to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after a 25-minute meeting Tuesday with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.
ref: Prime Minister Stephen Harper has agreed to send the government's 'Clean Air Act' to an all-party committee for review, before its second reading, after Tuesday's 25 minute meeting with NDP leader Jack Layton at the PMO.

src: Layton telah meminta perubahan pada rang undang-undang alam sekitar konservatif semasa pertemuan dengan PM, meminta “penulisan semula yang menyeluruh dan lengkap” untuk rang undang-undang alam sekitar parti Konservatif.
mt: Layton has asked for changes to the Conservative Party's environment policy during a meeting with the PM, asking for a "comprehensive and complete rewrite" of the Conservative Party's environment policy.
ref: Layton had asked for changes to the conservatives' environmental bill during the meeting with the PM, asking for a "thorough and complete rewriting" of the Conservative party's environmental bill.

src: Sejak Kerajaan Persekutuan melangkah untuk mengambil alih pembiayaan hospital Mersey di Devonport, Tasmania, kerajaan negeri dan beberapa ahli parlimen telah mengkritik akta ini sebagai aksi dalam awalan kepada pilihan raya persekutuan akan dipanggil menjelang November.
mt: Since the Federal Government stepped in to take over the funding of the Mersey Hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some members of parliament have criticized this act as an action in the forefront of the federal election to be called by November.
ref: Ever since the Federal Government stepped in to take over funding of the Mersey hospital in Devonport, Tasmania, the state government and some federal MPs have criticised this act as a stunt in the prelude to the federal election to be called by November.

src: Namun Perdana Menteri, John Howard telah berkata bahawa tindakan itu hanya untuk melindungi kemudahan hospital daripada diturun taraf oleh kerajaan Tasmania, dengan memberikan tambahan berjumlah $45 juta AUD.
mt: However, Prime Minister John Howard said the move was only to protect hospital facilities from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, with an additional $45 million AUD.
ref: But Prime Minister John Howard has said the act was only to safeguard the facilities of the hospital from being downgraded by the Tasmanian government, in giving an extra AUD$45 million.

src: Menurut buletin terkini, bacaan paras laut menunjukkan tsunami telah berlaku. Terdapat beberapa aktiviti tsunami yang jelas dicatatkan berhampiran Pago Pago dan Niue.
mt: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicate a tsunami has occurred.  There have been several clear tsunami events recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.
ref: According to the latest bulletin, sea level readings indicated a tsunami was generated. There was some definite tsunami activity recorded near Pago Pago and Niue.

src: Tiada kerosakan atau kecederaan teruk dilaporkan di Tonga, tetapi bekalan tenaga hilang buat sementara waktu, yang dilaporkan menghalang pihak berkuasa Tonga daripada menerima amaran tsunami yang dikeluarkan oleh PTWC.
mt: No major damage or injuries were reported in Tonga, but power outages were reported, which were said to prevent Tongan officials from receiving a tsunami warning issued by PTWC.
ref: No major damage or injuries have been reported in Tonga, but power was temporarily lost, which reportedly prevented Tongan authorities from receiving the tsunami warning issued by the PTWC.

src: Empat belas sekolah di Hawaii yang terletak di atau berdekatan pesisir pantai ditutup sepanjang hari Rabu walaupun amaran ditarik balik.
mt: 14 schools in Hawaii located on or near the beach were closed for the day Wednesday, even though the warning was withdrawn.
ref: Fourteen schools in Hawaii located on or near coastlines were closed all of Wednesday despite the warnings being lifted.

src: Presiden A.S. George W. Bush mengalu-alukan pengumuman itu dengan baik.
mt: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.
ref: U.S. President George W. Bush welcomed the announcement.

src: Jurucakap Bush, Gordon Johndroe memanggil Korea Utara ikrar “Langkah utama bergerak untuk mencapai matlamat dapat nyah-penukleusan ditentusahkan di wilayah rakyat Korea.”
mt: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a significant step forward in achieving the goal of verifiably denuclearizing the Korean peninsula."
ref: Bush spokesman Gordon Johndroe called North Korea's pledge "a major step towards the goal of achieving the verifiable denuclearization of the Korean peninsula."

src: Ribut yang kesepuluh dinamakan dalam musim Ribut Taufan Atlantik, Ribut Subtropika Jerry, terbentuk di Lautan Atlantik hari ini.
mt: 10th named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed today in the Atlantic Ocean.
ref: The tenth named storm of the Atlantic Hurricane season, Subtropical Storm Jerry, formed in the Atlantic Ocean today.

src: Pusat Taufan Nasional (NHC) mengatakan pada masa kini Jerry tidak memberi ancaman kepada darat.
mt: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) said at this time Jerry does not pose a threat to land.
ref: The National Hurricane Center (NHC) says that at this point Jerry poses no threat to land.

src: Syarikat Jurutera A.S. menganggarkan bahawa 6 inci daripada hujan boleh melanggar benteng yang sebelumnya rosak.
mt: 6 inches of rain could breach the levee that was previously damaged.
ref: The U.S. Corps of Engineers estimated that 6 inches of rainfall could breach the previously damaged levees.

src: Kawasan perumahan Ninth Ward yang mengalami banjir setinggi 20 kaki semasa Taufan Katrina kini berada pada paras pinggang ketika tanggul yang berdekatan telah melebihi batas.
mt: 9th Ward housing area that was flooded up to 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina is now up to the waist when the nearby levee has exceeded its limits.
ref: The Ninth Ward, which saw flooding as high as 20 feet during Hurricane Katrina, is currently in waist-high water as the nearby levee was overtopped.

src: Air melimpah ke tetambak seluas 100 kaki.
mt: 100-foot-long dikes overflowed.
ref: Water is spilling over the levee in a section 100 feet wide.

src: Pentadbir Commons Adam Cuerden menyatakan kekecewaannya atas pemadaman tersebut ketika beliau berbual dengan Wikinews pada bulan lalu.
mt: Commons administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his disappointment over the shutdown when he spoke to Wikinews last month.
ref: Commons Administrator Adam Cuerden expressed his frustration over the deletions when he spoke to Wikinews last month.

src: “Dia [Wales] pada dasarnya telah berbohong kepada kami dari awal. Pertama, dengan berlakon seolah-olah ini adalah bagi tujuan undang-undang. Kedua, dengan berpura-pura mendengar kami, sehingga dia memadam seninya.”
mt: “He [Wales] has basically lied to us from the start. First, by pretending this is for legal reasons. Second, by pretending to listen to us, until he wiped his slate clean.”
ref: "He [Wales] basically lied to us from the start. First, by acting as if this was for legal reasons. Second, by pretending he was listening to us, right up to his art deletion."

src: Kemarahan masyarakat membawa kepada usaha untuk merangka dasar mengenai kandungan seksual untuk laman web tersebut yang menjadi hos kepada berjuta-juta media berlesen terbuka.
mt: Anger from the public led to efforts to draft a policy on sexual content for the site that hosts millions of licensed open media.
ref: The community irritation led to current efforts to draft a policy regarding sexual content for the site which hosts millions of openly-licensed media.

src: Kerja yang dilakukan kebanyakannya secara teori, namun program tersebut ditulis untuk mensimulasi pemerhatian yang dibuat ke atas galaksi Sagittarius.
mt: The work is mostly done theoretically, but the program is written to simulate observations made on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: The work done was mostly theoretical, but the program was written to simulate observations made of the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Kesan yang dicari pasukan adalah disebabkan oleh daya pasang surut di antara jirim gelap galaksi dan jirim gelap Milky Way.
mt: The team's goal is to determine the effect of the galaxy's gravitational pull on dark matter.
ref: The effect the team was looking for would be caused by tidal forces between the galaxy's dark matter and the Milky Way's dark matter.

src: Sama seperti bulan yang mengenakan daya tarikan pada bumi lalu menyebabkan pasang surut air, begitu juga Bima Sakti yang mengenakan daya ke atas galaksi Sagittarius.
mt: Just as the moon exerts a pull on the earth causing tides, so too does the Milky Way exert a pull on the Sagittarius galaxy.
ref: Just like the moon exerts a pull on the earth, causing tides, so does the Milky Way exert a force on the Sagittarius galaxy.

src: Para saintis dapat menyimpulkan bahawa jirim gelap menjejaskan jirim gelap yang lain dalam cara yang sama dengan jirim biasa.
mt: Scientists can conclude that dark matter affects other dark matter in the same way as normal matter.
ref: The scientists were able to conclude that the dark matter affect other dark matter in the same way regular matter does.

src: Teori ini mengatakan bahawa perkara gelap di seluruh galaksi yang terletak di sekitar galaksi dalam sejenis halo, dan diperbuat daripada banyak zarah kecil.
mt: This theory says that dark matter is spread throughout the galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made up of many small particles.
ref: This theory says that most dark matter around a galaxy is located around a galaxy in a kind of halo, and is made of lots of small particles.

src: Laporan televisyen menunjukkan asap putih yang keluar dari loji.
mt: Television reports show white smoke coming from the factory.
ref: Television reports show white smoke coming from the plant.

src: Pihak berkuasa tempatan memberi amaran kepada penduduk di sekitar loji untuk kekal di rumah, matikan pendingin hawa dan tidak meminum air paip.
mt: Local authorities warned residents near the plant to stay home, turn off air conditioning and not drink tap water.
ref: Local authorities are warning residents in the vicinity of the plant to stay indoors, turn off air-conditioners and not to drink tap water.

src: Menurut agensi nuklear Jepun, sesium radioaktif dan iodine telah dikenal pasti di kilang tersebut.
mt: According to the Japanese nuclear agency, radioactive cesium and iodine have been identified at the plant.
ref: According to Japan's nuclear agency, radioactive caesium and iodine has been identified at the plant.

src: Pihak berkuasa telah membuat spekulasi yang ini menunjukkan bahwa bekas berisi bahan bakar uranium di lokasi mungkin telah pecah dan sedang bocor.
mt: Authorities have speculated that this may show that a container holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and is leaking.
ref: Authorities speculate that this indicates that containers holding uranium fuel at the site may have ruptured and are leaking.

src: Dr. Tony Moll menemui Batuk Kering Sangat Tahan Ubat (XDR-TB) di wilayah KwaZulu-Natal di Afrika Selatan.
mt: Dr. Tony Moll found Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the KwaZulu-Natal region of South Africa.
ref: Dr. Tony Moll discovered the Extremely Drug Resistant Tuberculosis (XDR-TB) in the South African region KwaZulu-Natal.

src: Dalam sebuah temuduga, beliau mengatakan bahawa varian baru “sangat membimbangkan dan menakutkan disebabkan kadar kematian yang tinggi.”
mt: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very concerning and scary because of the high death rate."
ref: In an interview, he said the new variant was "very highly troubling and alarming because of the very high fatality rate."

src: Beberapa pesakit mungkin telah dijangkiti kuman itu di hospital tersebut, fikir Dr Moll, dan sekurang-kurangnya dua orang merupakan pekerja kesihatan di hospital.
mt: Some patients may have been infected with the bacteria at the hospital, Dr Moll thinks, and at least two are health care workers at the hospital.
ref: Some patients might have contracted the bug in the hospital, Dr. Moll thinks, and at least two were hospital health workers.
